title: Hanes Men's ComfortBlend EcoSmart Jersey Polo, Large, Orange
features: Two pearlized buttons on a clean finished placket.
description: The quality of Hanes meets environmental responsibility with this blended polo made partially from recycled bottles, 50% cotton/50% polyester, 5.2-oz., fabric contains up to 5% recycled polyester from plastic bottles, welt collar, ribbed-knit cuffs, two pearlized buttons on a clean-finished placket, double-needle hem. Sizes: S-2XL (selected colors up to 3XL)
